question: The 3rd edition of International Sunflower Seed and Oil Conference(ISSOC) was held in Which of the following places in India
explanation: The 3rd edition of the International Sunflower Seed and Oil Conference(ISSOC) was held in Mumbai, Maharashtra (19th July-20th July 2019). International Sunflower Oil Association (ISOA) was the organizer of the event and it was hosted by Solvent Extractorsâ€™ Association of India (SEA). The first and second edition was held in at Shanghai (China) and Odessa (Ukraine) respectively.
